name: Corporal Avarik
Lore: 'Frequently engaged in brawls at the local enlisted clubs on homeworld of Corulag. Stormtrooper assigned to biker scout unit. Monitors Yuzzum activity.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of any speeder bike he pilots (when piloting it in battle, also adds 1 to your total battle destiny). When in a Local Trouble battle, adds one destiny to your total power.',
